Beating the final match
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: Misc. Q&A (post all new topics here, we'll make more sections later): Beating the final match
By alphamone on Saturday, February 2, 2008 - 01:48 am:

I just want to know if there is any special reward for beating the match that only becomes available after beating the "big four" single match S rank tourneys, because i just beat it, and was curious if there was any special reward, i believe that i got a silver peach for it, but i am not sure if it was the reward for that match or for something else.

By Ruby Wish on Thursday, April 3, 2008 - 06:22 pm:

when is final four?

By GM on Thursday, April 3, 2008 - 06:33 pm:

You can compete in the Major 4 after winning the Official S tourney, like most any other MR game. You'll receive invites before them as usual.

I haven't battled in the last one yet, but beating it grants you Master Rank.

By Ruby Wish on Thursday, April 3, 2008 - 06:43 pm:

By Thorr on Friday, April 4, 2008 - 04:41 am:

They are once every quarter and the ivitations you get will put the event on your calendar.
